para: igoprimo_poi supports POI files from iGo Primo 'next generation navigation' devices. iGo Primo is GPS Navigation Software that runs on Windows embedded platforms, and is used in some OEM and aftermarket automotive head units.

NOTE: GPSBabel should seamlessly read and convert .upoi files from your device. However, when converting to .upoi format, GPSBabel will encode as UTF-8, which the device won't read correctly. You will need to manually convert the output file to UTF-16 LE (UCS-2 LE BOM) encoding using a text editor, and then it will work as expected.
